comment._content: if this is 1912, cubs-giants at the polo grounds, it must have been one of these contests (cubs schedule and results found at baseball almanac). cubs game logs: 06-10-1912 at New York Giants 9-8 W 06-11-1912 at New York Giants 3-8 L 06-12-1912 at New York Giants 2-3 L 06-13-1912 at New York Giants 2-3 L 07-26-1912 at New York Giants 4-3 W 07-27-1912 at New York Giants 7-6 W 07-29-1912 at New York Giants 4-3 W 07-30-1912 at New York Giants 4-10 L 09-14-1912 at New York Giants 0-5 L 09-16-1912 at New York Giants 4-3 W 09-17-1912 at New York Giants 5-3 W
